title: How to write a good report writing about natural calamities - Quora

response.answer_text: From your question I presume you are talking about reporting, so what you could do, write what the event was, then what was the effect of the event, since you are talking about natural calamities, what occured,what was the impact of the occurance.why did it occur? that is the causeHow could it have been avoided.what precautions do we take to avert it.I normally like to add a bit on citizen responsibilities as we need take responsibilities as citizens.
